summary.para: Makes a service available to other objects on the same host.

param.name: guidService
param.para: A value of type GUID that specifies the service being offered.

param.name: psp
param.para: A pointer to an IServiceProvider interface.

param.name: pdwCookie
param.para: A pointer to a DWORD that receives an implementation-defined value used for identification purposes. The calling application must keep track of this value for possible use in .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Makes a service unavailable that had previously been available to other objects through .

param.name: dwCookie
param.para: A value of type DWORD that specifies an implementation-defined value used for identification purposes. The calling application receives this value from .

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Exposes a general mechanism for objects to offer services to other objects on the same host.

remarks.para: Objects that expose a service first call on their host for this interface, then execute .
